cms_formusercontrol.UserControlDescription: Allows for the management of a many-to-many relationship with custom table data, persisted via a join table.
cms_formusercontrol.UserControlParameters: <form><category caption="Related Data Settings" name="RelatedDataSettings" visible="True"/><field column="RelatedCustomTable" columnsize="200" columntype="text" displayinsimplemode="true" fieldcaption="Related Data Table" fielddescription="The custom table to be used as the other side of this relationship." fieldtype="CustomUserControl" guid="b61df434-7c19-4966-a630-eb9dc5d236cc" publicfield="false" visibility="none" visible="true"><settings><controlname>customtableselector</controlname></settings></field><field column="RelatedDataNameField" columnsize="100" columntype="text" dependsonanotherfield="true" displayinsimplemode="true" fieldcaption="Name Field" fielddescription="The name field for related data items." fieldtype="CustomUserControl" guid="273293d6-4a04-484c-a265-81b5b687186a" publicfield="false" visibility="none" visible="true"><settings><controlname>textboxcontrol</controlname></settings></field><category caption="Join Table Settings" name="JoinTableSettings" visible="True"/><field column="JoinCustomTable" columnsize="200" columntype="text" displayinsimplemode="true" fieldcaption="Join Table" fielddescription="The custom table to be used as the join table." fieldtype="CustomUserControl" guid="a18578de-67d2-4e7a-8db8-d3c7594d3235" publicfield="false" visibility="none" visible="true"><settings><controlname>customtableselector</controlname></settings></field><field column="JoinTableLeftKey" columnsize="100" columntype="text" displayinsimplemode="true" fieldcaption="Left Key Column Name" fielddescription="The column name in the join table that contains the keys for this object (the left side of the relationship)." fieldtype="CustomUserControl" guid="44d72440-3468-4d2b-acf7-413c6cf372e8" publicfield="false" visibility="none" visible="true"><settings><controlname>textboxcontrol</controlname></settings></field><field column="JoinTableRightKey" columnsize="100" columntype="text" displayinsimplemode="true" fieldcaption="Right Key Column Name" fielddescription="The column name of the join table that contains the keys for the related objects (the right side of the relationship)." fieldtype="CustomUserControl" guid="549fb326-f16b-4add-a0ef-ef701b77f5fb" publicfield="false" visibility="none" visible="true"><settings><controlname>textboxcontrol</controlname></settings></field><field column="UseGuid" fieldcaption="Relate documents by GUID" visible="true" defaultvalue="false" columntype="boolean" fieldtype="CustomUserControl" allowempty="true" fielddescription="If using this form control on a document type, check this box to store relationships using the document's GUID instead of its ID. This will ensure relationships can be moved to a different site. If using this option, make sure the column specified by JoinTableLeftKey is of type GUID." publicfield="false" guid="b8c4b688-9357-4506-a1b8-e2a39e115c91" visibility="none"><settings><controlname>checkboxcontrol</controlname></settings></field></form>
